DOC.brief_title: Is Efficacy Epidural Steroid Injections Related Different Volume Injections ?
DOC.detailed_description: Objectives : This study aim investigate impact use different epidural volume . Methods : Seventy five patient acute discogenic pain include study.The patient randomly assign three group . All patient receive single epidural dose triamcinolone [ 80 mg ] 12.5 mg bupivacaine combination . The patient Group 1 , Group 2 Group 3 receive volume 10 mL , 15 mL , 20 mL epidural injection , respectively . The efficacy treatment assess VAS ( visual analog scale ) [ O= pain , 10 = unbearable pain ] , SLET ( straight leg elevation test ) [ 0° = worst , 85° = best ] , Oswestry Disability Index ; ODI [ 0 % 20 % : minimal disability , 80 % 100 % : bed bound patient ] 2 week EPSI .
DOC.criteria: acute discogenic pain less three month duration respond modality conservative management [ NSAIDs , physiotherapy , bracing , etc . ] , radiological disc bulge accompany unilateral root impingement symptom , Oswestry daily activity score 20 percent , resistance treatment . Patients bilateral root impingement symptom , neurological deficit , and/or history previous lumbar disc surgery , severe cardiac , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , renal disease , glaucoma , urinary retention , and/or know allergy drug use study exclude study .
